summary.overview: The CardDemo application provides a comprehensive menu-driven interface for credit card management operations. It features user authentication with role-based access control, directing administrators to administrative functions and regular users to standard card management operations.
business_functions: User Authentication - Validate user credentials against security database and establish user session
Role-Based Access Control - Determine user privileges and route to appropriate menu based on admin or regular user status
Administrative Menu Management - Display and manage administrative functions for authorized admin users
Regular User Menu Management - Display and manage standard card operations for regular users
Menu Option Validation - Validate user selections and ensure access permissions are enforced
Program Navigation Control - Transfer control to selected business functions based on user menu choices
Session Management - Handle user sessions, sign-on/sign-off processes, and session validation
Error Handling and User Feedback - Display appropriate messages for invalid inputs, authentication failures, and system errors

CM00.program_overview: Main menu interface for regular users providing access to card management functions
User authentication and sign-on screen for credential validation and user routing
Administrative menu interface providing access to admin-only functions
